title: New: Lucy Camp – The Heart Dies
content:
San Jose’s Lucy Camp is one of the freshest sounding new artists around right now.

There’s a sincerity and dynamism to her vocal delivery that really elevates her above the competition, most poignantly on latest single, The Heart Dies. Channeling the likes of P.O.S., it’s an emotionally raw track, that manages to tackle a whole host of important issues within it’s four and a half minutes, with Camp reaching a near scream by the track’s finale. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
